name: Clear eyes - THE JIG IS UP (with Reo Cragun & Kevin George)

attributes.trait_type: THE JIG IS UP (with Reo Cragun & Kevin George)

metadata.description:
This is song 2 from CACOPHONY, a new project from Reo Cragun and myself. CACOPHONY is a beautiful explosion. Deafeningly loud and chaotic and intimate at the same time. 

FROM REO:
The jig is up is honestly about reading through the facade and people’s BS. 

The road of an independent artist can be extremely difficult at first, but if you put in the work it can prove to be really rewarding. Fortunately now I’m in a position where I don’t have to jump at a major label deal anymore and have the means to comfortably support myself. Oddly enough it’s at that point when a lot of people come knocking to partner. 

We were really just having fun with this record and reflecting on the level we’ve gotten to based off hard work and staying consistent.

FROM CLEAR EYES:

Having fun was so key with this one. Reo and I make a lot of heavy shit together (like the first single from CACOPHONY, HEAVEN) but it’s important to balance that with music that makes you feel good, makes you feel powerful. We love Kevin George’s energy and adding a feature just added to the excellent vibes.
metadata.name: THE JIG IS UP (with Reo Cragun & Kevin George) #1
metadata.title: THE JIG IS UP (with Reo Cragun & Kevin George)
